data: Mentored a graduate class of 85 students by conducting weekly office hours, tutoring sessions and grading coursework
Assisted professor in timely assessment and provided relevant feedback to students to support continuous learning
Collaborated on developing a PaaS DevOps web application that helps data science learners to build and deploy working environments and data pipelines on cloud platforms
Developed a toolkit for users to add artefacts and generate report from model and data cards 60% faster
Designed a system using which project owner can control access to users with 3 levels of permissions (read, write and audit)
Optimized the UI and made the application responsive and mobile friendly
Assisted faculty with classroom technologies and facilitating interactions with remote learners
Maintained the computers and audiovisual equipment in the NUFlex classrooms across campus
Operated and troubleshot new technologies in the classrooms
Ensured smooth NUFlex instruction for both instructors and students by providing technical support in the classroom
Handled streaming, lecture recording, and posting of NUFlex courses
Contributed as a Full Stack Developer to develop a web application for Physicians to monitor Patients. Built authentication module to secure backend APIs using Cognito
Created a chatbot using Amazon Lex that can help patients resolve health queries and connect with physicians. Wrote and reviewed code in 2 languages JavaScript and Python
Represented VISTAN Health at the MIT COVID-19 Challenge and the Crisis Challenge Innovation Competition
Developed automated claim processing tool using Java and Selenium, which expedited processing of claims by 10%
Built a production tool to generate complex queries using VBA to help associates without knowledge in SQL to retrieve details from database on to an Excel sheet
Led the R&D team to find a solution in automating the web-based screens inside windows-based FACETS by integrating Winium and Sikuli to Cognizantâ€™s CRAFT framework to achieve 100% automation
